name: Greenleaf
description: Greenleaf is an osciloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box and a classic screen, it stands out in the crowd. Its arms and legs are designed in a hand-down position, giving it a friendly and approachable appearance. Greenleaf possesses a unique combination of abilities and skills, making it an invaluable asset to the WebtrES club.
